pages.title: Vein Mining
pages.text: $(italic)Still mining each ore individually? Gravity might make this easier.$()$(br2)Vein Mining rips out all connected blocks.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to all tools.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Vein Mining by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
